channel.title: Help with chatlogs (solved...)
channel.description:
[EDIT]: Never Mind I fixed it...
I am wondering: Is there any way to make the name of the "chatlog.txt" have a date on it so it would be "chatlog10/28/10.txt", so then I could delete the old chatlogs... since they build up fast... Thanks Hihid27

item.title: Help with chatlogs (solved...)
item.dc:creator: @hihid27 hihid27
item.description:
@hihid27 wrote:

[EDIT]: Never Mind I fixed it…

I am wondering:
Is there any way to make the name of the “chatlog.txt” have a date on it so it would be “chatlog10/28/10.txt”, so then I could delete the old chatlogs… since they build up fast…
Thanks
Hihid27
